name: Wings of Time
description:
Description:

Play as the butterfly of time! Navigate through space and time and collect the missing time fragments. The game is inspired but the theme of time. Press the spacebar to jump over gaps. Reach the goal to win! Made with Unity.

Artstation: https://snowball375129.artstation.com/projects/lVyebY

Credits:

Game Design: Taylor Wood

Music: Taylor Wood

Sound Effect: Andromadax24 https://freesound.org/people/Andromadax24/sounds/186719/
